name: Modern Fabric Armchair
description: A sleek fabric armchair with a sturdy wooden frame and cushioned seat. Perfect for adding style and comfort to your living room or office.

name: Contemporary Wingback Chair
description: This wingback chair features a bold design with soft fabric upholstery and gold-tone legs, making it a statement piece for any modern home.

name: Minimalist Wooden Dining Chair
description: Lightweight and stylish, this minimalist wooden dining chair blends seamlessly with any dining setup while offering excellent durability.

name: Plush Lounge Chair
description: A lounge chair with soft cushioning and a wooden frame, ideal for relaxing in style whether indoors or on your balcony.

name: Premium Leather Armchair
description: Crafted with premium leather and a strong wooden structure, this armchair combines luxury and comfort for any living space.

name: Vintage Wooden Chair
description: A vintage-inspired wooden chair with a cushioned seat and backrest. Perfect for adding a classic touch to your interiors.

name: Matte Black Wooden Chair
description: Bold and modern, this matte black wooden chair is perfect for dining areas, cafés, or home offices.

name: Scandinavian Style Chair
description: This Scandinavian-style wooden chair with a curved backrest offers both elegance and comfort for any modern living space.

description: Timeless white sneakers perfect for casual wear.

description: Elegant leather shoes for formal and office wear.
